p: The treatment is symptomatic, employing analgetic drugs and antipyretic therapy to control body temperature. Pleconaril has been considered as potential specific treatment for EV-associated meningitis. However, it was not approved, given its just modest efficacy and considerable side-effect and interaction profile [ 11, 12]. In particularly severe cases, administration of immunoglobulins may positively influence the course of the disease [ 13].
